See bug 64625 for more information.

Because of the JIT, its difficult to say where the NPE really happens. 
Assuming that it fails when the editor has been closed, this would imply the 
an editor has been closed without having called its dispose method properly. A 
similar behavior has been reported in bug 62321.

Moving to Platform UI for comment.
Kai, any steps to recreate this, do you remember when it might have happened?
No. Everything we know is in bug 64625 and bug 62321.
Kai, have you seen this again in recent builds?

Marking as WORKSFORME since nobody can reproduce this, but tagging as RC3 for
further verification in the verification pass.
